param.name: startValue
param.label: Start Value
param.description: The starting y-axis value for the trendline. Say, if you want to plot a slanted trendline from value 102 to 109, the startValue would 102.

param.name: endValue
param.label: End Value
param.description: The ending y-axis value for the trendline. Say, if you want to plot a slanted trendline from value 102 to 109, the endValue would 109. If you do not specify a value for endValue, it would automatically assume the same value as startValue.

param.name: color
param.label: Color
param.description: Color of the trend line and its associated text.

param.name: displayValue
param.label: Display Value
param.description: If you want to display a string caption for the trend line by its side, you can use this attribute. Example: displayValue='Last Month High'. When you don't supply this attribute, it automatically takes the value of startValue.

param.name: isTrendZone
param.label: Is trend zone
param.description: Whether the trend would display a line, or a zone (filled colored rectangle).

param.name: showOnTop
param.label: Show on top
param.description: Whether the trend line/zone would be displayed over other elements of the chart.
